variables.installCloudLibs:
[concat(variables('singleQuote'), '#!/bin/bash
echo about to execute
checks=0
while [ $checks -lt 120 ]; do echo checking mcpd
/usr/bin/tmsh -a show sys mcp-state field-fmt | grep -q running
if [ $? == 0 ]; then
echo mcpd ready
break
fi
echo mcpd not ready yet
let checks=checks+1
sleep 1
done
echo loading verifyHash script
/usr/bin/tmsh load sys config merge file /config/verifyHash
if [ $? != 0 ]; then
echo cannot validate signature of /config/verifyHash
exit
fi
echo loaded verifyHash
echo verifying f5-cloud-libs.tar.gz
/usr/bin/tmsh run cli script verifyHash /config/cloud/f5-cloud-libs.tar.gz
if [ $? != 0 ]; then
echo f5-cloud-libs.tar.gz is not valid
exit
fi
echo verified f5-cloud-libs.tar.gz
echo expanding f5-cloud-libs.tar.gz
tar xvfz /config/cloud/f5-cloud-libs.tar.gz -C /config/cloud
touch /config/cloud/cloudLibsReady', variables('singleQuote'))]
